education.degree: Dual Degree : B.S. in Computer Science

projects.name: Parking Management System
descriptions: This full-stack parking application, built with FlutterFlow and Firebase, solves real-world urban problems on a small scale via real-time parking management. Including comprehensive technical documentation, it demonstrates mastery in database architecture and cross-platform deployment, proving the ability to design, document, and scale functional, data-driven software for complex environments.

certifications.title: CS50 Certificate
certifications.description: A rigorous 12-week introduction to computer science. Mastering Python, students complete intense problem sets for 9 weeks and a complex final project, proving their ability to build full-stack applications and solve sophisticated, low-level algorithmic challenges.

certifications.title: Data Structures and Algorithms Bootcamp
certifications.description: Live, industry-standard bootcamp focused on mastering data structures and algorithms

skills.Tools & Services: Git, Springboot, AWS, Firebase, FlutterFlow, Numpy and Pandas(in progress)
